title: From Bauhaus to the Bates Motel
content:
Saul Bass's title sequence for the movie "Psycho" is compared with his interest in Josef Albers and other abstract painters:

[http://www.designdrivethru.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20130910004445/http:/www.designdrivethru.net/ "http://www.designdrivethru.net")

You can also watch the movie clip on the site. I think Bass's early motion graphics were sort of abstract paintings that move. And it's clever of him to start slicing up type before Norman Bates even shows up on screen. ;-)
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content:
